thread.title: Another batch of 444 pilgrims leave Jammu for Amarnath
thread.title_full: Another batch of 444 pilgrims leave Jammu for Amarnath | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Another batch of 444 pilgrims leave Jammu for Amarnath
text:
Other Articles Letters to the editor US Presidential Race: Republican hopefuls prep for first debate - and Donald Trump Mystery shrouds death of Osama bin Laden's family members in UK crash Amid tight security, a batch of 444 pilgrims today left for the cave shrine of Amarnath in the south Kashmir Himalayas.
The batch of 342 men, 96 women and six children left in a motorcade of 13 vehicles from Bhagwati Nagar base camp here at 4.50 AM, a police official said.
Amid tight security arrangements provided by CRPF, the convoy has already crossed Kud on Jammu-Srinagar national highway.
With todayâ€™s batch, as many as 45,886 pilgrims have so far left from the Jammu base camp for the shrine.
First Published on August 02, 2015 12:57 pm
